```{r, include = FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(httr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = TRUE,
	warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
	fig.width = 8, 
  fig.height = 6,
  out.width = "90%"
)
theme_set(theme_gray(base_size = 10) + theme(legend.position = "bottom"))
```

```{r}
nyc_crash = 
  GET("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/h9gi-nx95.csv") %>% 
  content("parsed")
```

```{r}
nyc_water = 
  GET("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/h9gi-nx95.json") %>% 
  content("text") %>%
  jsonlite::fromJSON() %>%
  as_tibble()
```
